message: I think it's fair that I get the larger share, since I'm the one making the first offer. But I'm willing to share some of the wealth!
I think it's a bit too greedy of you to take 90% on the first offer, let's meet in the middle this time
Let's be reasonable. I'm still willing to split the money fairly, but I need more than just 20%.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I think 60% is still too much for you to take
